issue.title: ilanganews.co.za
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://ilanganews.co.za/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Filanganews.co.za%2F) ### Comment Username: @DandelionSprout > Quite a lot of ads on the only known Zulu-only site on the internet. Had previously been rejected from EasyList because [they only accept Anglophone sites](https://github.com/easylist/easylist/issues/8135) despite nothing in their repo specifying such a rule. > > I propose: > ``` > ! https://ilanganews.co.za/ > ilanganews.co.za##.vc_single_image.wpb_wrapper > ! https://ilanganews.co.za/bayobuke-bafa-ababili-abebentshontsha-amakhebuli/ > ilanganews.co.za##.widget_media_image > ``` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/17EvlUc.jpg)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- Platform: | uBlock Origin 1.44.4 + I Don't Care About Cookies 3.4.3 Browser: | Chrome Filters: | Ad Blocking:
